title: APE raggiunger i 27 USD entro la fine del 2022
description: Il prezzo di apecoin (APE) potrebbe salire dal livello attuale di circa 15 USD a 27 USD alla fine di quest'anno.

title: Gold Miners Outshine Bitcoin Miners To Start 2022. Will It Last?
description: With a sleepy start to 2022 bitcoin has been outpaced by the classic commodity  but this could change fast.

title: Bitcoin Is A Liquid Alternative To Cash Says Elon Musks Tesla
description: In a recent SEC filing Tesla explained bitcoins liquidity use case while outlining its long-term potential.

title: Interruzione di Solana: l'impatto sui prezzi  minore
description: Dopo almeno 9 giorni con interruzioni segnalate finora nel 2022 il prezzo di SOL non sembra eccessivamente influenzato dai problemi di rete.

title: Why Terras Anchor Protocol Changed Earn Rate To 18% APY
description: Anchor Protocol one of the most popular platforms in the Terra ecosystem rolled out a change in its Earn Rate. The latter will begin to operate in a semi-dynamic fashion...

title: Belgian regulator mandates registration for companies providing crypto-related services
description: Crypto companies looking to operate in Belgium must have a corporate structure hold a minimum capital of 50000 and register with the Belgian financial watchdog.

title: Billionaire Ricardo Salinas Fires Back At Warren Buffetts Bitcoin Slander
description: Bitcoin is not topping the list of the favorite investments of some big names in the financial sector. One of those is billionaire Warren Buffett who has not been shy...

title: Michael Saylor Jack Dorsey Pen Letter To EPA Refuting Bitcoin Energy FUD
description: A letter authored by Michael Saylor Jack Dorsey and other members of the Bitcoin Mining Council was sent to the EPA refuting energy FUD about mining bitcoin.

title: Bitcoin Songsheet: Private Property And Covenants
description: Bitcoin stands out because it is a digital bearer asset that gives full private property rights to its users and development must carefully protect this aspect.

title: Safemoon is down 96.5% down from all-time high after Coffeezillas recent fraud allegations
description: Safemoon's price fell almost 50% in one day following the latest video accusation of fraud against the projects founder.

title: Analysts Predict ApeCoin To Hit $50 By End Of 2025  And $100 By 2030
description: As Bitcoin and Ethereum price remain bearish for the longest time now  barely hitting above $40000 for BTC and not going over $3000 for ETH ApeCoin on the other hand...

title: Bitfarms Mined 405 Bitcoin In April Now Holds 5646 BTC
description: Bitfarms released a bitcoin mining update detailing a 75% YoY increase in production and the custodying of 99% of total mined BTC in April.

title: Crypto.com slashes rewards to ensure long-term sustainability
description: Some users slammed the changes to the Crypto.com rewards program saying the cuts are sudden and too aggressive.

title: Wikipedia non accetter pi donazioni in criptovalute
description: La Wikimedia Foundation l'ente che gestisce l'enciclopedia web Wikipedia creata dagli utenti ha annunciato che non accetter pi donazioni in criptovalute.

title: Germany is the number one tax haven for crypto investors with 0% tax rates
description: Cryptocurrency investors in Germany can benefit from 0% tax rates on their profits if they hold their coins for a year without cashing out.

title: Hoseki Partners With Ledn For Easy Proof Of Ownership In Bitcoin-Backed Loans
description: Hosekis upcoming bitcoin-native asset attestation service promises to speed up the loan taking process.

title: Warren Buffett thinks he could own 100% of Bitcoin
description: Warren Buffett explains why he thinks Bitcoin lacks any real value by asking what he would do if he owned 100% of the supply

title: Goldman Sachs recently offered its first Bitcoin (BTC)-backed loan
description: The large investment bank announced the opening of its first-ever loan facility backed by Bitcoin. This comes a few months after their $100k price forecast for the popular cryptocurrency.

title: Ethereum user spends $44000 in gas fees to mint Bored Ape Otherside NFTs
description: Bored Ape Otherdeed NFTs were so popular the Ethereum blockchain struggled to cope with demand.

title: TA: Ethereum Recovers But ETH Must Clear This Key Resistance
description: Ethereum started a recovery wave above the $2800 level against the US Dollar. must clear the $2850 resistance to continue higher in the near term. Ethereum started a decent recovery...

title: TA: Bitcoin Consolidates Below $39k: What Could Trigger Another Decline
description: Bitcoin extended decline below the $38000 level against the US Dollar. BTC is recovering but it must clear $39000 for upside continuation. Bitcoin remained in a bearish zone below $40000...

title: Heres why Bitcoin may have to deal with a recession in 2024
description: Economists worldwide are raising fears that we could be heading towards a recession by 2024.

title: After USTs success a new race for L1 stablecoins is here
description: The algorithmic stablecoin TerraUSD (UST) has proven to be wildly successful becoming the third largest in the market. This has changed the playing filed for all.

title: A looming global energy crisis could directly affect Bitcoin miners
description: Rising energy costs predicted by the world bank may have a direct effect on the bitcoin network but will it make much difference?

title: Ethereum core developer to launch Web3 app store for data
description: We spoke with the co-founder of Laconic Maly Ly who has teamed up with Ethereum developer Rick Dudley to create a data app store for web3.
